original: de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i ri lta bu dam pa'i chos kyi gdan sengge'i khri las slar nur nas rin po che'i sku rten drangs te /
analyzed: de nas de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser btso ma'i ri lta bu dam pa'i chos kyi gdan sengge'i khri las slar nur nas rin po che'i sku rten drangs te /

analyzed: de la sku brten dga' bo la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa /

analyzed: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong rnal 'byor na phra ba'i yang phra ba'i bdud kyi las dang / bdud kyi khams mngon sum du snang ste /

original: khyed kyis de rig par ma nus na /
analyzed: khyed kyis de rig par ma nus na /

analyzed: lha'i bdud / bar bar ni /
translated: sometimes the māra of the aggregates🔽 Translation: You and the rest should generate the mind of unsurpassed great awakening and take up the supreme feeling.🔽I have already explained the Dharma of correct practice, but you have not yet understood it.

analyzed: yi dvags dang lha ma yin gyis byin gyis brlabs te skabs rnyed do //

analyzed: nang du sems kyis mtshor nas rkun po la bu yin par bzung ste /
translated: Because you have fallen into wrong views,🔽sometimes the māra of the aggregates🔽sometimes the māra of the afflictions🔽sometimes the māra of the devaputras🔽sometimes the māra of death🔽sometimes the māra of the five sense objects🔽sometimes the māra of the four māras🔽sometimes the māra of the four māras🔽sometimes the māra of the five sense objects🔽sometimes the māra of death🔽sometimes the māra of the devaputras🔽sometimes the māra of the afflictions🔽sometimes the māra of the aggregates

original: yang de'i nang nas chung shas tsam gyi thob pa la grub ste chog go snyam du sems pa ni /
analyzed: yang de'i nang nas chung shas tsam gyi thob pa la grub ste chog go snyam du sems pa ni /
translated: But if you think, I have attained a little of that, and that is enough,

original: @413a *// bsam gtan bzhi la chags pa dang mtshungs so //
analyzed: @413a *// bsam gtan bzhi la chags pa dang mtshungs so //
translated: you are like one attached to the four meditations.

original: de ni / mtshams med pa'i dge slong ste /
analyzed: de ni / mtshams med pa'i dge slong ste /
translated: He is a monk who has committed a deed of immediate retribution.

original: 'phags pa thob bo snyam du bsam pas rdzun byas so //
analyzed: 'phags pa thob bo snyam du bsam pas rdzun byas so //
translated: He has lied, thinking, “I have attained the noble path.”

original: lha tshe zad pa'i khar yang ltas pa mngon du byung ste /
analyzed: lha tshe zad pa'i khar yang ltas pa mngon du byung ste /
translated: And he has slandered the arhats, saying, When the life of a god is exhausted, the signs of death appear.

original: dgra bcom pa la'ang phyi ma'i lus len to //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa la'ang phyi ma'i lus len to //
translated: Even arhats take up a body in the next life.

original: zhes skur ba btab nas mtshams med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
analyzed: zhes skur ba btab nas mtshams med pa'i dmyal bar ltung ngo //
translated: And he has fallen into the hell of immediate retribution.

original: khyod nyon la legs par soms te yid la gyis shig dang / ngas da khyod kyi phyir zhib tu bye brag dbye'o //
analyzed: khyod nyon la legs par soms te yid la gyis shig dang / ngas da khyod kyi phyir zhib tu bye brag dbye'o //
translated: Listen, reflect well, and keep it in mind, and I will now explain it to you in detail.

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' bo stan las langs pa dang / 'khor gyi nang nas slob pa mthun pa dag kyang rab tu dga' nas spyi bos btud de lus dang sems shin tu gus shing dang bas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes dgongs pa las slar nyan to //
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' bo stan las langs pa dang / 'khor gyi nang nas slob pa mthun pa dag kyang rab tu dga' nas spyi bos btud de lus dang sems shin tu gus shing dang bas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rjes dgongs pa las slar nyan to //
translated: When the Buddha had spoken thus, Nanda rose from his seat, and from within the assembly those who were in accord with the teaching were overjoyed. They bowed their heads to the ground, and with body and mind full of respect and faith, they listened again to the Buddha’s compassionate thoughts.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang / 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo dang / 'khor thams cad la bka' stsal pa /
translated: Then the Buddha said to Nanda and the entire assembly:

original: khyed la sogs pa shes par gyis shig /
analyzed: khyed la sogs pa shes par gyis shig /
translated: “You and the others should understand that

original: ngo bo nyid kyi tshor ba dam pa gsal ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshor ba rgyas pa ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi tshor ba dam pa gsal ba de bzhin nyid kyi tshor ba rgyas pa ni /
translated: the pure feeling of intrinsic nature, the feeling of suchness that is expansive,🔽is not separate from or different from all the buddhas of the ten directions and the defiled worldly beings born from the twelve classes.

original: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rigs bcu gnyis las skyes pa'i zag pa can gyi 'jig rten par yang so so ma yin zhing tha mi dad mod kyi; yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi don nor ba'i nyes pa las thibs po dang sred pa byung zhing skyes so //
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad dang / rigs bcu gnyis las skyes pa'i zag pa can gyi 'jig rten par yang so so ma yin zhing tha mi dad mod kyi; yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi don nor ba'i nyes pa las thibs po dang sred pa byung zhing skyes so //
translated: However, from the error of the unrealized meaning of perception, the thicket and craving arose and were born.”

original: de ltar skyes shing byung nas de'i phyir stong pa rang bzhin yod par 'gyur @413b te; thams cad du 'khrul ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar skyes shing byung nas de'i phyir stong pa rang bzhin yod par 'gyur @413b te; thams cad du 'khrul ba yin no //
translated: In this way, having been born and arisen, for that reason, emptiness would become an existent nature, and it would be a delusion everywhere.

original: 'khrul pa las rdzus pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir 'jig rten byung ngo //
analyzed: 'khrul pa las rdzus pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir 'jig rten byung ngo //
translated: Because the continuity of delusion is uninterrupted, the world arises.

original: de lta bas na /
analyzed: de lta bas na /
translated: Therefore,

original: phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo'i zhing khams kyang mi zag pa med do; ;de lta bu ni /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i rdul phra mo'i zhing khams kyang mi zag pa med do; ;de lta bu ni /
translated: the pure lands of the subtle particles in the ten directions are also not pure.

original: 'khrul ba'i pho theg can yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhung 'dzugs par shes par byos shig /
analyzed: 'khrul ba'i pho theg can yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyis gzhung 'dzugs par shes par byos shig /
translated: You should understand that such a deluded person is one who establishes a treatise with an incorrect perception.

original: nam mkha' stong pa ni /
analyzed: nam mkha' stong pa ni /
translated: The empty sky

original: nang nas khyed kyi sems las skyes so //
analyzed: nang nas khyed kyi sems las skyes so //
translated: arises from your mind.

original: dper na / nam mkha' las sprin glo bur du byung na 'jig rten pa thams cad de'i nang na 'dug pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na / nam mkha' las sprin glo bur du byung na 'jig rten pa thams cad de'i nang na 'dug pa bzhin te /
translated: For example, if a cloud suddenly appears in the sky, all worldly people think that it is inside.

original: khyed las 'ga' zhig gis yang dag pa 'di la ma phyogs na phyogs bcu'i stong pa thams cad kyang zhi zhing byang ste /
analyzed: khyed las 'ga' zhig gis yang dag pa 'di la ma phyogs na phyogs bcu'i stong pa thams cad kyang zhi zhing byang ste /
translated: If any of you do not turn toward this truth, all the emptiness in the ten directions will be pacified and purified.

original: nam mkha'i khams kyi yul thams cad ci'i phyir g-yo /
analyzed: nam mkha'i khams kyi yul thams cad ci'i phyir g-yo /
translated: Why do all the lands in the realm of space tremble?

original: rab tu g-yo bar mi 'gyur /
analyzed: rab tu g-yo bar mi 'gyur /
translated: Why do they not tremble greatly?

original: phyogs bcu'i zag pa zad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa dag khyed bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor spyod de /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i zag pa zad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa dag khyed bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin la rnal 'byor spyod de /
translated: The bodhisattvas in the ten directions who have exhausted defilements, and the arhats, you who practice yoga in concentration and samādhi,

original: sems dang zhing sa le bar de bzhin nyid la rtse gcig gi ting nger 'gyur na /
analyzed: sems dang zhing sa le bar de bzhin nyid la rtse gcig gi ting nger 'gyur na /
translated: when your minds are pure and you become one-pointedly concentrated in suchness,

original: bdud kyi rgyal po thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / sems can ma rabs la sogs pa'i khang khyim kun ni /🔽snyil / sa chen po ni /
analyzed: bdud kyi rgyal po thams cad dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / sems can ma rabs la sogs pa'i khang khyim kun ni / snyil / sa chen po ni /
translated: all the palaces of the kings of māras, gods, humans, asuras, and wicked beings,🔽will collapse,

original: rab tu g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: rab tu g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
translated: and the great earth will tremble greatly.

original: chu'i nang na gnas pa dang / skam la gnas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'phur ba de dag khyed la sogs pas ci'i phyir snyil zhing g-yo bar 'gyur /🔽lha ma yin dang / yi @414a *//
analyzed: chu'i nang na gnas pa dang / skam la gnas pa dang / nam mkha' la 'phur ba de dag khyed la sogs pas ci'i phyir snyil zhing g-yo bar 'gyur / lha ma yin dang / yi @414a *//
translated: Why do those who dwell in water, on land, and in the sky tremble and collapse for you and others?

original: dvags dang / lha'i bdud dag zhe sdang che bar g-yo ba'ang yod de /
analyzed: dvags dang / lha'i bdud dag zhe sdang che bar g-yo ba'ang yod de /
translated: The asuras, pretas, and celestial māras also tremble with great hatred.

original: khyed bsam gtan sgom pa'i thad du 'ongs nas gnod pa byas su zin kyang mtshan ma'i dri ma la goms pa'i nang nas khyed kyis tshor ba'i snying por gtugs na /
analyzed: khyed bsam gtan sgom pa'i thad du 'ongs nas gnod pa byas su zin kyang mtshan ma'i dri ma la goms pa'i nang nas khyed kyis tshor ba'i snying por gtugs na /
translated: Even if you come to meditate on concentration and are harmed, from among the habitual stains of signs, you have reached the essence of feeling.

original: de'i phyir 'ong ba rlung gis phog pa bzhin /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'ong ba rlung gis phog pa bzhin /
translated: Therefore, like wind striking a coming wind,

original: chu la ral gri btab pa ltar /
analyzed: chu la ral gri btab pa ltar /
translated: like a sword striking water,

original: gcig gis gcig la gnod par mi 'gyur /
analyzed: gcig gis gcig la gnod par mi 'gyur /
translated: one does not harm the other.

original: phas kyis rgol ba'i chab rom sra ba la khyed kyi drod kyis chu tshan khol bas khad kyis nye zhing myur du 'ju ba'i phyir bdud la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs kyang rang nyon mongs su zad de don med do //
analyzed: phas kyis rgol ba'i chab rom sra ba la khyed kyi drod kyis chu tshan khol bas khad kyis nye zhing myur du 'ju ba'i phyir bdud la sogs pas byin gyis brlabs kyang rang nyon mongs su zad de don med do //
translated: The hard ice of the opponent's argument is gradually melted by your heat, like boiling water, and quickly dissolves. Therefore, even if blessed by demons and so on, the afflictions are exhausted in themselves and are meaningless.

original: de ltar na mgron dang mtshungs te grub pa dang / bshig cing gyes par yang byed do //
analyzed: de ltar na mgron dang mtshungs te grub pa dang / bshig cing gyes par yang byed do //
translated: Thus, like guests, they are accomplished and also destroyed and separated.

original: khyed kyi sems kyi nang nas phung po lnga'i bdag po 'khrul te mgron gyis skabs rnyed na de nyid du tshor bas chud par bsam gtan du bsgoms na 'khrul bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: khyed kyi sems kyi nang nas phung po lnga'i bdag po 'khrul te mgron gyis skabs rnyed na de nyid du tshor bas chud par bsam gtan du bsgoms na 'khrul bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: If you meditate on the five aggregates as guests who have arrived, and on the self as the host, then you will not be deluded.

original: khyed la bdud kyi rgol bas mi thub bo //
analyzed: khyed la bdud kyi rgol bas mi thub bo //
translated: You will not be overcome by the attacks of Mara.

original: phung po byang ba'i gsal ba la zhugs na phyin ci log gi tshogs kun so sor med par 'gyur te /
analyzed: phung po byang ba'i gsal ba la zhugs na phyin ci log gi tshogs kun so sor med par 'gyur te /
translated: If you enter into the clarity of the purification of the aggregates, then the entire host of errors will be individually eliminated.

original: snang bas ni /
analyzed: snang bas ni /
translated: For example,

original: mun nag sel nus so //
analyzed: mun nag sel nus so //
translated: light is able to dispel darkness.

original: nyi bar 'ongs kyang rang dul bar 'gyur na /
analyzed: nyi bar 'ongs kyang rang dul bar 'gyur na /
translated: Even the sun, when it has arisen, is self-disciplined.

original: bsam gtan pa la gnod pa byed lta ga la zhig spobs /
analyzed: bsam gtan pa la gnod pa byed lta ga la zhig spobs /
translated: How much less would it be able to harm a meditator?

original: de ltar tshor bas chud par ma byas na phung pos slu ba yin no //
analyzed: de ltar tshor bas chud par ma byas na phung pos slu ba yin no //
translated: If you do not meditate on the aggregates as guests who have arrived, then you will be deceived by the aggregates.

original: dga' bo / khyod ni /
analyzed: dga' bo / khyod ni /
translated: Nanda,

original: bdud kyi bur 'gyur te /
analyzed: bdud kyi bur 'gyur te /
translated: you will become a son of Mara,

original: bdud kyi mi la @414b sgrub pa byed do //
analyzed: bdud kyi mi la @414b sgrub pa byed do //
translated: and you will accomplish the work of Mara.

original: ma thang ga lta bu mthu chung yang sngags kyi mthu'i phyir khyod kyi tshul khrims 'jig par nus so //
analyzed: ma thang ga lta bu mthu chung yang sngags kyi mthu'i phyir khyod kyi tshul khrims 'jig par nus so //
translated: Even though you are weak, like a small child, you will be able to destroy morality because of the power of the mantra.

original: khri phrag brgyad kyi spyad pa'i nang nas tshul khrims gcig bshig kyang sems yongs su dag pa'i phyir khyod ma rmongs ma 'thoms te /
analyzed: khri phrag brgyad kyi spyad pa'i nang nas tshul khrims gcig bshig kyang sems yongs su dag pa'i phyir khyod ma rmongs ma 'thoms te /
translated: Even if you destroy one of the eight myriads of precepts, because your mind is completely pure, you are not confused or deluded.

original: de ni / bsod nams yod pa'i phyir khyod kyi rin po che'i lus ma 'khyams so //🔽dper na / blon po chen po'i khang khyim skad cig so sor bgos te khyed la med na /
analyzed: de ni / bsod nams yod pa'i phyir khyod kyi rin po che'i lus ma 'khyams so // dper na / blon po chen po'i khang khyim skad cig so sor bgos te khyed la med na /
translated: Because you have merit, your precious body will not wander.

original: skyabs byed mi nus pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: skyabs byed mi nus pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: For example, if the great minister’s house is divided into individual rooms, you will not be able to protect it.

original: dga' bo / shes par gyis shig /
analyzed: dga' bo / shes par gyis shig /
translated: Nanda, understand this!

original: khyed byang chub kyi snying por rnal 'byor na dvangs shing gsal bas g-yo ba dang / mi g-yo ba thams cad kyis mi skul te /
analyzed: khyed byang chub kyi snying por rnal 'byor na dvangs shing gsal bas g-yo ba dang / mi g-yo ba thams cad kyis mi skul te /
translated: If you practice at the essence of enlightenment, clear and lucid, you will not be moved by anything that moves or does not move.

original: drang ba dang brjod par ro gcig pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas na mtshan ma thams cad zad de /
analyzed: drang ba dang brjod par ro gcig pa'i de kho na nyid la gnas na mtshan ma thams cad zad de /
translated: If you abide in reality, which is of one taste with what is straight and what is said, all signs will cease.

original: sgrib pa med na /
analyzed: sgrib pa med na /
translated: If there are no obscurations,

original: de ni / mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de ni / mtshan ma dang bral ba'o //
translated: that is free from signs.

original: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag na /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag na /
translated: If you rest in equipoise in samādhi,

analyzed: skyes bu mig dang ldan pa mun nag gi nang du phyin pa dang mtshungs te /

analyzed: rang bzhin gsal zhing dvangs mod kyi /
translated: Although the nature is clear and bright,

analyzed: da dung sems kyi 'od ma byung bas de ni /
translated: the light of the mind has not yet arisen.

original: gzugs kyi phung pos bsgribs pa'o //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung pos bsgribs pa'o //

original: mig dang ldan pas ni /
analyzed: mig dang ldan pas ni /
translated: A person with eyes

original: phyogs bcur sa ler snang ste /
analyzed: phyogs bcur sa ler snang ste /
translated: will see clearly in the ten directions.

original: ci'ang lus pa med de /
analyzed: ci'ang lus pa med de /
translated: There is nothing left.

original: de'i ming ni /
analyzed: de'i ming ni /
translated: This is called

original: gzugs kyi phung por zad de /
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung por zad de /
translated: the exhaustion of the aggregate of form.

original: mi de ni /
analyzed: mi de ni /
translated: That person

original: bskal ba'i snyigs ma las 'das so //
analyzed: bskal ba'i snyigs ma las 'das so //
translated: has transcended the defilement of the eon.

original: don de la brtags na /
analyzed: don de la brtags na /
translated: When this meaning is examined,

original: yang dag ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi rtsa ba srab pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang dag ma yin pa'i 'du shes kyi rtsa ba srab pa'i phyir ro //
translated: it is because the root of unreal perception is thin.

original: dga' bo / de lta bu la gnas @415a *//
analyzed: dga' bo / de lta bu la gnas @415a *//
translated: Nanda, if you abide in this way

original: shing sbyangs na gsal zhing dvangs te /
analyzed: shing sbyangs na gsal zhing dvangs te /

analyzed: de'i ming ni /

translated: They will be pervaded and filled with this, and it will spread further and further, so that they will turn away from the citadel of nirvāṇa and be born in the family of the seed of the māra of the gods.

original: yang rigs kyi bu dag 'du byed thams cad stong pa'i mthar phyin par 'gog pas /
analyzed: yang rigs kyi bu dag 'du byed thams cad stong pa'i mthar phyin par 'gog pas /
translated: “Moreover, sons of noble family, by putting an end to all formations,

original: skye ba 'gog pa las zhi bar 'gog pa'i nang nas dang ba dam pa ma rgyas pas /
analyzed: skye ba 'gog pa las zhi bar 'gog pa'i nang nas dang ba dam pa ma rgyas pas /
translated: they will put an end to birth, and within the cessation of peace, they will not have the highest purity.

original: tshe snang ba'i nang nas dang ba'i dri ma yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin par bye brag 'byed /
analyzed: tshe snang ba'i nang nas dang ba'i dri ma yang dag pa dang yang dag pa ma yin par bye brag 'byed /
translated: Within the light of life, they will distinguish between the pure and the impure stains.

original: rgyud pa 'bras bu'i re ba bsgrubs pas mngon rtags tshol te; yongs su dag pa'i lam las log nas de'i phyir sdug bsngal ni shes //
analyzed: rgyud pa 'bras bu'i re ba bsgrubs pas mngon rtags tshol te; yongs su dag pa'i lam las log nas de'i phyir sdug bsngal ni shes //
translated: They will seek signs by fulfilling the hope for the result of the continuum, and they will turn away from the path of complete purity. Therefore, they will think, ‘Suffering is known,

original: kun 'byung ba ni spangs /
analyzed: kun 'byung ba ni spangs /
translated: the origin is abandoned,

original: 'gog pa ni mngon du byas /
analyzed: 'gog pa ni mngon du byas /
translated: cessation is realized,

original: lam ni bsgoms te /🔽'gog pa @443a *//
analyzed: lam ni bsgoms te / 'gog pa @443a *//
translated: and the path is cultivated.’

original: la gnas pas yang gong du mi 'phar te rgyal zhing grol lo snyam pa skyes so //
analyzed: la gnas pas yang gong du mi 'phar te rgyal zhing grol lo snyam pa skyes so //
translated: They will abide in cessation, and they will not rise up again. They will think, ‘I am victorious and liberated.’

original: de ni / nges pa'i nyan thos kyi nang du lhung ste /
analyzed: de ni / nges pa'i nyan thos kyi nang du lhung ste /
translated: They will fall into the certainty of the śrāvakas,

original: thos pa nyung bas nga rgyal skyes pa'i dge slong gi sder 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thos pa nyung bas nga rgyal skyes pa'i dge slong gi sder 'gyur ro //
translated: and become a community of monks who have generated pride due to their meager learning.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni /🔽nor / shes shing mthong ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni / nor / shes shing mthong ba ni /
translated: The enlightenment of the Buddha🔽will be lost and obscured

original: stor cing nub bo //
analyzed: stor cing nub bo //
translated: by those who know and see🔽the emptiness of all phenomena.

original: de'i ming ni /
analyzed: de'i ming ni /
translated: Their name

original: dang ba rgyas pa'i sems kyis mngon rtags tshol te zhi ba 'dus pa'i 'bras bu dgu pa ste /
analyzed: dang ba rgyas pa'i sems kyis mngon rtags tshol te zhi ba 'dus pa'i 'bras bu dgu pa ste /
translated: will be those who seek signs with a mind of expansive faith, the ninth fruition of the assembly of peace.🔽Having spread out and expanded from the empty fortress of nirvāṇa, they will return to the cause of bondage and be born into that type of existence.

original: khyab cing rgyas pa las phyi phyir zhing bsrings te mya ngan las 'das pa'i mkhar nas log nas stong bas bcings pa'i rgyu las de'i rigs su skye'o; ;yang rigs kyi bu dag 'du byed thams cad stong pa'i mthar phyin par 'gog pas /
analyzed: khyab cing rgyas pa las phyi phyir zhing bsrings te mya ngan las 'das pa'i mkhar nas log nas stong bas bcings pa'i rgyu las de'i rigs su skye'o; ;yang rigs kyi bu dag 'du byed thams cad stong pa'i mthar phyin par 'gog pas /
translated: “Moreover, sons of noble family, by reaching the end of the emptiness of all conditioned things,

original: skye ba 'gog pa las zhi bar 'gog pa'i nang nas dang ba dam pa ma rgyas pas /
analyzed: skye ba 'gog pa las zhi bar 'gog pa'i nang nas dang ba dam pa ma rgyas pas /
translated: they will cease being born and, from within the cessation of peace, their sublime faith will not expand.

original: rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i tshor ba gsal ba zab mo dam par sbyangs nas mya ngan las 'das par sems shing /
analyzed: rgyas pa yongs su dag pa'i tshor ba gsal ba zab mo dam par sbyangs nas mya ngan las 'das par sems shing /
translated: Having trained in the profound, sacred, clear, and pure feeling of expansion, they think of nirvana.

original: gong du mi 'phar te rgyal zhing grol lo snyam pa skyes so //
analyzed: gong du mi 'phar te rgyal zhing grol lo snyam pa skyes so //
translated: They do not rise higher, and they think, “I have won and been liberated.”

original: mi de ni /
analyzed: mi de ni /
translated: That person

original: rigs nges pa'i rang sangs rgyas su lhung ste /
analyzed: rigs nges pa'i rang sangs rgyas su lhung ste /
translated: falls into the pratyekabuddha of definite lineage.

original: sems mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro //
translated: They will become a buddha who does not turn back.

original: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni /🔽nor / shes shing mthong ba ni /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ni / nor / shes shing mthong ba ni /
translated: The enlightenment of buddhahood

original: stor cing nub bo //
analyzed: stor cing nub bo //
translated: is lost and obscured.

original: de'i ming ni /
analyzed: de'i ming ni /
translated: Their name

original: rgyas pa tshor ba ting nger gsal ba'i mi g-yo ba'i 'bras bu grub pa bcu pa ste /
analyzed: rgyas pa tshor ba ting nger gsal ba'i mi g-yo ba'i 'bras bu grub pa bcu pa ste /
translated: is the tenth result of the immovable one, the person of clear, expanded feeling.

original: khyab cing rgyas pa las phyi phyir zhing ring nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mkhar las log nas @443b skyabs mi byed pa'i rgyas par gsal ba'i sa bon las de'i rigs su skye'o //
analyzed: khyab cing rgyas pa las phyi phyir zhing ring nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mkhar las log nas @443b skyabs mi byed pa'i rgyas par gsal ba'i sa bon las de'i rigs su skye'o //
translated: From the seed of clear expansion, which is the opposite of the fortress of nirvana, they are born in that lineage.

original: dga' bo / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bcu ni /
analyzed: dga' bo / ting nge 'dzin rnam pa bcu ni /
translated: Nanda, the ten kinds of samādhi

original: bar ma dor smyo ba la brten pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
analyzed: bar ma dor smyo ba la brten pa'i rgyur 'gyur te /
translated: become the cause of insanity in the bardo.

original: bar bar ni /
analyzed: bar bar ni /
translated: In between,

original: ma grub pa la chog cing tshud do snyam pa'i sems skyes so //
analyzed: ma grub pa la chog cing tshud do snyam pa'i sems skyes so //
translated: there is the thought that one has attained what has not been attained.

original: 'di kun ni /
analyzed: 'di kun ni /
translated: All of these

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin te /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po yin te /
translated: are the aggregate of consciousness.

original: sgom pa nor ba las sa 'dir skyes so //
analyzed: sgom pa nor ba las sa 'dir skyes so //
translated: They are born on this ground from the error of meditation.

original: pho theg can gyi skye bo rnams bslad pas rang gi nyams drod ma zin te /
analyzed: pho theg can gyi skye bo rnams bslad pas rang gi nyams drod ma zin te /
translated: Because the beings of the vehicle of men are deluded, they do not recognize their own experience.

original: rgyu rkyen de lta bu dang phrad nas rang rang gi sngon gyi sems 'khrul ba'i bag chags la sred de /
analyzed: rgyu rkyen de lta bu dang phrad nas rang rang gi sngon gyi sems 'khrul ba'i bag chags la sred de /
translated: Having encountered such causes and conditions, they crave their own previous confused habitual tendencies of mind.

original: bdag gi yun ring po'i gnas kyis 'di yin no snyam du sems shing bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bcing ba rdzogs so //🔽zhes smras te /
analyzed: bdag gi yun ring po'i gnas kyis 'di yin no snyam du sems shing bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi bcing ba rdzogs so // zhes smras te /
translated: Thinking, “This is my long-term abode,” they are bound by unsurpassed enlightenment.

original: de ni / rdzun chen por 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ni / rdzun chen por 'gyur ro //
translated: That is said to be a great lie.

original: log par lta ba'i bdud dang / mu stegs kyi las zad nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
analyzed: log par lta ba'i bdud dang / mu stegs kyi las zad nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal bar ltung ngo //
translated: The māra of wrong views and the karma of the tīrthikas are exhausted, and they fall into the Avīci hell.

original: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su'ang 'phel zhing 'bogs par yang mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su'ang 'phel zhing 'bogs par yang mi 'grub bo //
translated: They do not progress and reach the śrāvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

original: khyed sems gcig tu gyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam sgrubs shig /
analyzed: khyed sems gcig tu gyis la de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam sgrubs shig /
translated: You should unify your minds and practice the path of the Tathagata.

original: chos kyi sgo 'di khyer la nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi na ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe gcig nas gcig tu spel te /
analyzed: chos kyi sgo 'di khyer la nga mya ngan las 'das pa'i phyi na ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe gcig nas gcig tu spel te /
translated: Take up this Dharma gateway and, after I have passed into nirvāṇa, in the future, spread it from one to another.

original: 'di'i don sems can thams cad kyis mngon par shes shing rig pa bgyis te /
analyzed: 'di'i don sems can thams cad kyis mngon par shes shing rig pa bgyis te /
translated: Make it so that all sentient beings understand and know its meaning.

original: lta ba'i bdud la rang bying bar ma byed cig /
analyzed: lta ba'i bdud la rang bying bar ma byed cig /
translated: Do not let them fall into the māras’ views.

original: snying rjes srungs shig /
analyzed: snying rjes srungs shig /
translated: Protect them with compassion.

original: skyabs bgyis te log pa'i rkyen sol la zhi bar gyis shig /
analyzed: skyabs bgyis te log pa'i rkyen sol la zhi bar gyis shig /
translated: Give them refuge, remove the conditions for error, and bring them peace.🔽Do not let them fall into the path of obstacles

original: bgegs kyi @444a *//
analyzed: bgegs kyi @444a *//
translated: or the path of the deceivers.

original: lam dang / log 'dren gyi lam du ma nor bar lus dang sems sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa'i lam gyi nang du zhugs te thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du grub par byos shig /
analyzed: lam dang / log 'dren gyi lam du ma nor bar lus dang sems sangs rgyas kyis mkhyen pa dang / gzigs pa'i lam gyi nang du zhugs te thog ma dang tha ma'i bar du grub par byos shig /
translated: Let their bodies and minds enter the path of the buddhas’ knowledge and vision, and let them accomplish it from beginning to end.

original: snga ma 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra mo snyed kyang chos kyi sgo 'di bzhin du mdzad de /
analyzed: snga ma 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa gangga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rdul phra mo snyed kyang chos kyi sgo 'di bzhin du mdzad de /
translated: In the past, in eons as numerous as the sands of the Ganges, Tathagatas as numerous as the atoms of a Buddha-land have also used this Dharma door.

original: theg pa 'dis sems grol nas bla na med pa'i lam bsgrubs so //
analyzed: theg pa 'dis sems grol nas bla na med pa'i lam bsgrubs so //
translated: Through this vehicle, their minds were liberated, and they accomplished the unsurpassed path.

original: rnam par shes pa'i phung po zad na khyed kyis mngon sum du dbang po thams cad 'khrul bar spyad pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rdo rje sgam po'i gsal ba rgyas shing dang ba'i sems kyi nang du dkris te 'jug nus na /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa'i phung po zad na khyed kyis mngon sum du dbang po thams cad 'khrul bar spyad pa'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab rdo rje sgam po'i gsal ba rgyas shing dang ba'i sems kyi nang du dkris te 'jug nus na /
translated: If you can exhaust the aggregate of consciousness, you will directly experience the confusion of all the faculties. Within that, you will be able to roll up the sharp and clear vajra wisdom of the bodhisattvas and enter it into the pure mind.

original: gtsang zhing dang ba'i bee d'urya'i nang na rin po che'i zla ba dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: gtsang zhing dang ba'i bee d'urya'i nang na rin po che'i zla ba dang 'dra'o //
translated: It will be like a precious moon within a pure and clear vaidurya.

original: de bzhin du gong du 'phar na yid ches pa bcu dang / gnas pa bcu dang / spyod pa bcu dang / bsngo ba bcu dang / sems bskyed pa sbyong ba bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i sa bcu sbyong ba dang mnyam par tshor ba rgyas par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phra ba'i yang phra ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug go /
analyzed: de bzhin du gong du 'phar na yid ches pa bcu dang / gnas pa bcu dang / spyod pa bcu dang / bsngo ba bcu dang / sems bskyed pa sbyong ba bzhi dang / byang chub sems dpa'i rdo rje'i sa bcu sbyong ba dang mnyam par tshor ba rgyas par snang ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i phra ba'i yang phra ba la sogs pas brgyan pa'i rgya mtshor 'jug go /
translated: Likewise, if one ascends, one enters the ocean adorned with the subtle and very subtle of the tathāgatas, and so on, by means of the ten assiduous trusts, the ten abidings, the ten practices, the ten dedications, the four trainings in bodhicitta, and the purification of the ten vajra stages of the bodhisattva.

original: gang zhing rgyas pa'i byang chub thob pa med pa la brten te /
analyzed: gang zhing rgyas pa'i byang chub thob pa med pa la brten te /
translated: Since the attainment of the extensive stage of enlightenment does not exist,

original: des ni / snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gsal bar rnal 'byor bas phra @444b ba'i yang phra ba'i bdud kyi spyod yul mngon sum du snang ste /
analyzed: des ni / snga ma 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gsal bar rnal 'byor bas phra @444b ba'i yang phra ba'i bdud kyi spyod yul mngon sum du snang ste /
translated: the field of experience of the subtle and very subtle māras of the past bhagavān buddhas of the past clearly appear to the yogin of śamatha and vipaśyanā.

original: khyed kyi sems kyis shes par byas nas dri ma bkrus shing gsal bas lta ba log pa'i nang du mi ltung ste /
analyzed: khyed kyi sems kyis shes par byas nas dri ma bkrus shing gsal bas lta ba log pa'i nang du mi ltung ste /
translated: Having been understood by your mind, since the stains are washed and clarified, one does not fall into the view of annihilation.

original: phung po'i bdud ni /
analyzed: phung po'i bdud ni /
translated: The māra of the skandhas

original: zhi zhing byang /
analyzed: zhi zhing byang /
translated: It is peaceful and pure.

original: lha'i bdud ni /
analyzed: lha'i bdud ni /
translated: The māra of the gods

original: bcom zhing btul te /
analyzed: bcom zhing btul te /
translated: is conquered and subdued.

original: lha ma yin dang mthu bo che rnams kyi sems stor bar byed /
analyzed: lha ma yin dang mthu bo che rnams kyi sems stor bar byed /
translated: The minds of the asuras and the powerful ones are lost.

original: thi ba'i bang lang rnams ni /
analyzed: thi ba'i bang lang rnams ni /
translated: The flocks of doves🔽are unable to arise and appear.

original: skye zhing 'byung bar mi nus so; ;byang chub kyi bar du phongs shing 'bral ba'ang med /
analyzed: skye zhing 'byung bar mi nus so; ;byang chub kyi bar du phongs shing 'bral ba'ang med /
translated: Up to awakening, there is no lack or separation.

original: zhan cing nyam chung ba las 'phrog cing skyed yod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: zhan cing nyam chung ba las 'phrog cing skyed yod par 'gyur ro //
translated: It snatches away and produces what is weak and feeble.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa la sems mi 'khrul cing myos par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa la sems mi 'khrul cing myos par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The mind is not confused or deluded about nirvāṇa.

original: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can dag rmongs shing glen pa bsam gtan mi shes /
analyzed: ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can dag rmongs shing glen pa bsam gtan mi shes /
translated: In the future, sentient beings who are confused and ignorant, who do not know concentration,

original: chos 'chang mi shes par ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor la sred pa ni /
analyzed: chos 'chang mi shes par ting nge 'dzin gyi rnal 'byor la sred pa ni /
translated: and who do not know how to uphold the Dharma, craving the yoga of samādhi,

original: khyed log pa dang mthun gyis dogs so //
analyzed: khyed log pa dang mthun gyis dogs so //
translated: are afraid of being in accord with what is false.

original: sems gcig tu nga'i gtsug tor gyi gzungs bstan pa 'di gzungs su zungs shig /
analyzed: sems gcig tu nga'i gtsug tor gyi gzungs bstan pa 'di gzungs su zungs shig /
translated: Unify your minds and uphold this dhāraṇī that I have taught from my uṣṇīṣa.

original: da ste kha ton du ma nus na sgom pa'i khang bu la bri ba'am /
analyzed: da ste kha ton du ma nus na sgom pa'i khang bu la bri ba'am /
translated: If you are unable to recite it now, write it in your meditation hut.

original: yang na lus la btags na phas kyi rgol ba'i bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
analyzed: yang na lus la btags na phas kyi rgol ba'i bdud thams cad kyis mi tshugs so //
translated: If it is attached to the body, then all the māras of opponents will not be able to harm it.

original: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' yun du sgrub pa'i phyi ma'i chag tshad 'bebs pa yin gyi; khyed kyis gus par gyis shig /
analyzed: phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtha' yun du sgrub pa'i phyi ma'i chag tshad 'bebs pa yin gyi; khyed kyis gus par gyis shig /
translated: It is the ultimate accomplishment of the tathāgatas of the ten directions. It is the future standard for measuring the Dharma. You should respect it.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' bo langs te spyi bos phyag btsal nas dran zhing mi brjed par gzungs @445a *//🔽su 'dzin to //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dga' bo langs te spyi bos phyag btsal nas dran zhing mi brjed par gzungs @445a *// su 'dzin to //
translated: When the Bhagavān had spoken thus, Nanda rose, bowed his head, and upheld it in memory without forgetting it.

original: 'khor mang po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
analyzed: 'khor mang po 'dus pas bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa /
translated: The assembled multitude addressed the Bhagavān, saying,

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin phung po lnga'i gzugs kyi nang nas yang dag pa lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa lnga'i rtsa ba phra ba'i yang phra ba'i don te /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin phung po lnga'i gzugs kyi nang nas yang dag pa lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa lnga'i rtsa ba phra ba'i yang phra ba'i don te /
translated: “As the Bhagavān has said, within the five aggregates, the five kinds of correct perceptions are the root of subtle subtlety.

original: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sogs pa la rtag tu bka' stsal cing bshad dam gsungs na yang phung po lnga gcig car 'dag cing 'byang ngam /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pas bdag cag la sogs pa la rtag tu bka' stsal cing bshad dam gsungs na yang phung po lnga gcig car 'dag cing 'byang ngam /
translated: If the Tathāgata constantly speaks and explains to us and so forth, are the five aggregates purified and cleansed simultaneously?🔽Or do they gradually cease?

original: rim gyis zad de lnga'i mtshams ni /
analyzed: rim gyis zad de lnga'i mtshams ni /
translated: What is the limit of the five?

original: gang lags / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos dgongs te ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi snang zhing gsal ba'i sems kyi mig tu 'gyur bas 'khor mang po 'di nyid la bshad du gsol /
analyzed: gang lags / de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen pos dgongs te ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sems can thams cad kyi snang zhing gsal ba'i sems kyi mig tu 'gyur bas 'khor mang po 'di nyid la bshad du gsol /
translated: With the Tathāgata’s great compassion, please explain to this great assembly so that it will become the eye of the mind that illuminates and clarifies all sentient beings in the future.”

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' bo la bka' stsal pa /
translated: The Bhagavān said to Nanda:

original: ngo bo nyid kyi tshor ba dam pa gsal ba rgyas pa ni /
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi tshor ba dam pa gsal ba rgyas pa ni /
translated: “The pure, clear, and vast sublime intrinsic feeling

original: dag ste skye shi la mi gnas na /
analyzed: dag ste skye shi la mi gnas na /
translated: is pure and does not abide in birth and death.

original: dri ma'i bsgos pa nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi bar du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bar du 'du shes kyi rgyu ba'i phyir skye ba g-yos te /
analyzed: dri ma'i bsgos pa nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad kyi bar du yang dag pa ma yin pa'i bar du 'du shes kyi rgyu ba'i phyir skye ba g-yos te /
translated: From the taint of smell up to the realm of space, because of the movement of discrimination, birth moves.

original: de'i de bzhin ngo bo nyid kyi tshor ba dam pa gsal ba rgyas pa las yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi snod kun skyes so //
analyzed: de'i de bzhin ngo bo nyid kyi tshor ba dam pa gsal ba rgyas pa las yang dag pa ma yin pa'i 'jig rten gyi snod kun skyes so //
translated: From the pure, clear, and true sensation of the suchness of that [nature of mind], the entire unreal world of vessels arose.

original: dper na / yeng zhing 'khrul te mgo med pa rmis nas grib ma la mgo bo snyam du sems so //
analyzed: dper na / yeng zhing 'khrul te mgo med pa rmis nas grib ma la mgo bo snyam du sems so //
translated: For example, when one dreams of a headless person, one thinks that the shadow is a head.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtsa ba de ni /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtsa ba de ni /
translated: The root of unreality

original: rgyu med de /

original: mi de'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig sems kyi skad cig tsam gyi bar du tshangs shing 'byung ste /
analyzed: mi de'i kha na ma tho ba'i sdig sems kyi skad cig tsam gyi bar du tshangs shing 'byung ste /
translated: The person’s mind will be purified of the evil karma of his transgressions, down to the very instant of his evil thoughts.

original: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las thar nas bde ba'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyu las thar nas bde ba'i zhing du skye bar 'gyur te /
translated: He will be freed from the causes of suffering in the hells and will be reborn in a land of bliss.

original: bsod nams thob pa ni /
analyzed: bsod nams thob pa ni /
translated: The merit he will obtain

original: snga ma'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum phrag khri'i cha dang / de bzhin du rtsis dang / grangs dang / dpe'i bar du bsgrun du med do; ;dga' bo /
analyzed: snga ma'i sbyin pa'i bsod nams kyi brgya'i cha dang / stong gi cha dang / 'bum phrag khri'i cha dang / de bzhin du rtsis dang / grangs dang / dpe'i bar du bsgrun du med do; ;dga' bo /
translated: cannot be compared to even a hundredth, a thousandth, a hundred thousandth, or a millionth of the merit of his previous generosity.

original: sems can la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di kha ton du 'don cing sngags 'di gzungs su bzung na /
analyzed: sems can la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di kha ton du 'don cing sngags 'di gzungs su bzung na /
translated: Nanda, if any sentient being recites this sutra and memorizes this mantra,

original: bskal ba mi zad pa'i bar du yang ngas bshad par mi nus so; ;khyed rnams ngas bshad pa'i gzhung bzhin spyod na /
analyzed: bskal ba mi zad pa'i bar du yang ngas bshad par mi nus so; ;khyed rnams ngas bshad pa'i gzhung bzhin spyod na /
translated: I cannot explain the merit he will obtain even in an endless eon. If you practice in accordance with the scriptures I have explained,

original: byang chub grub kyi bar du bdud kyi lam las thar ro //
analyzed: byang chub grub kyi bar du bdud kyi lam las thar ro //
translated: you will be freed from the path of Mara until you attain enlightenment.”

original: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad dang / lha ma yin dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @448b dang /
analyzed: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 'jig rten gyi lha thams cad dang / lha ma yin dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' @448b dang /
translated: When he had spoken thus, the monks, nuns, laymen, laywomen, all the worldly gods, the asuras, and the bodhisattvas who had gathered from other world systems,

original: theg pa gsum gyi 'phags pa dang / drang srong gi bu gtsang ma dang / thog ma sems bskyed pa'i mthu bo che dang / yi dvags rnams shin tu dga' zhing mgu nas phyag btsal te so sor dong ngo //
analyzed: theg pa gsum gyi 'phags pa dang / drang srong gi bu gtsang ma dang / thog ma sems bskyed pa'i mthu bo che dang / yi dvags rnams shin tu dga' zhing mgu nas phyag btsal te so sor dong ngo //
translated: the noble ones of the three vehicles, the pure sons of the sages, the mighty ones who had first generated the mind of awakening, and the hungry ghosts were overjoyed and delighted. They bowed down and went their separate ways.

original: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsag tor chen po'i le'u stong phrag bcu pa las /
analyzed: 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsag tor chen po'i le'u stong phrag bcu pa las /
translated: From the noble Sūtra of the Ten Thousand Chapters on the Great Uṣṇīṣa of the Tathāgatas,🔽the tenth chapter of the Tathāgata’s secret, accomplished by all bodhisattvas, is completed.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa don mngon par thob par spyod pa'i rgyu le'u bcu pa rdzogs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bsgrubs pa don mngon par thob par spyod pa'i rgyu le'u bcu pa rdzogs so //
translated: The attainment of the meaning, the cause of conduct.
